name: The Last Siege
description: A mighty city, unconquered for a thousand years, finally falls to overwhelming force after a months-long siege
emotional_core: The weight of inevitability crushing hope

name: The Fractured Realm
description: A once-unified empire splinters into seven warring kingdoms, each claiming legitimacy

name: The Purification
description: A dominant faith launches a campaign to eradicate a 'heretical' sect, slaughtering believers and innocents alike

name: The Silent Ending
description: Multiple advanced kingdoms collapse within a generation from unclear causes - drought, invasion, internal rot
emotional_core: When no one remembers why everything fell

name: The Prophet's War
description: A visionary claims divine mandate and raises an army of millions against the established order

name: The Throne of Thorns
description: Two branches of the same royal bloodline war for decades over succession

name: The Night of Bells
description: A spontaneous uprising massacres an occupying force in a single night across an entire island
emotional_core: Rage long suppressed erupting without warning

name: The Pretender's Era
description: False claimants to the throne emerge repeatedly, each gathering followers, causing chaos
emotional_core: When no one knows who to believe or follow

name: The General's Betrayal
description: A trusted military commander turns his armies against the empire he once served

name: The Endless Campaign
description: A dynastic conflict stretches across generations, outliving those who started it
